1110011101000001 0010111001101001 0 -> sum: 0001010110101010, cout: 1
0011110011111011 0010101011000110 0 -> sum: 0110011111000001, cout: 0
1010111000000000 0101010111100101 0 -> sum: 0000001111100101, cout: 1
